description.value:
The Demon Queen of Spiders is a fickle goddess, as likely to offer a gift as she is to bestow a curse.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Rare

Property:

You gain resist 5 poison and a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks.

Level 13: Resist 10 poison and +3 item bonus to Stealth checks.

Level 23: Resist 15 poison and +5 item bonus to Stealth checks.

Power - Encounter (Immediate Reaction)

Trigger: An enemy bloodies you with an attack.

Effect: Roll a d8. On an odd number, you are dazed until the end of your next turn. On an even number, you teleport up to a number of squares equal to the die roll and become invisible until the end of your next turn.
